title: A board showing the location of such public parking space should be displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority
clause_text: A board showing the location of such public parking space should be displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority. Area covered under such parking shall not be counted towards FSI consumption.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: A board showing the location of such public parking space should be displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority.
